entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Infinity Tank Battle
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š9,99Â â‚¬ â†’ Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 9,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Compras integradas

  • 500 Ticketsï¼š9,99Â â‚¬
  • 200 Ticketsï¼š5,99Â â‚¬
  • 50 Ticketsï¼š1,99Â â‚¬
  • Golden Passï¼š1,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Tank Battle is very popular TV game since 8-bit console present. From 2012, we develop "Super Tank Battle" and provide 500 maps to player. Many people play it day by day. Now we using a new game engine to offer new game "Infinity Tank Battle". Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements. Core Game Rule: - Defence your base - Destroy all enemy tanks Key Features: - Different type of enemy - Different type of Map style - Special items - Auto Helper tank - Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Funcionalidades de Black Border 2: SimulaÃ§Ã£o autÃªntica de patrulha de fronteira: Coloque-se no papel de um verdadeiro agente, onde cada decisÃ£o conta e cada interaÃ§Ã£o estÃ¡ carregada de tensÃ£o. entry.title: Inkblade Idlers: Wuxia RPG
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š3,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 0,99Â â‚¬ [0,99Â â‚¬ ~ 3,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • 1000 Redemption Ticketsï¼š9,99Â â‚¬
  • 80 Redemption Ticketsï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Welcome to "Inkblade Idlers", where the serene beauty of ink-wash painting meets the thrilling world of wuxia martial arts in an idle RPG adventure. Effortless Progression, Deep Strategy Your heroes train and battle automatically, earning silver and experience even when you are offline. Return to spend resources on powerful skills, legendary weapons, and rare manuals to push your team further. Conquer Mighty Bosses, Collect Secret Manuals Face towering martial arts masters in epic showdowns. Each victory unlocks ancient secret manuals that teach your heroes unique and devastating abilities to customize your combat style. Manage Your Martial World Upgrade your shop to increase income, expand your backpack to hold more treasures, and strategically equip your team. Every decision strengthens your path to becoming the ultimate martial arts legend. Key Features: - Breathtaking ink-wash art inspired by traditional Chinese painting - True idle gameplay with progress happening 24/7 - Collect and customize hundreds of weapons, armor, and martial arts manuals - Strategic management of shops, resources, and inventory - Challenging boss fights against powerful martial arts masters Download Inkblade Idlers now and begin your tranquil yet powerful journey to martial arts supremacy. No grinding required.

entry.title: SmallFish Chess for Stockfish
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š5,99Â â‚¬ â†’ Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 5,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Application Description

SmallFish is a project based on the Stockfish chess engine. It uses the latest Stockfish chess engine (Stockfish 17.1), rated about Elo 3600+ and is the strongest chess app on the App Store. SmallFish offers you three distinct ways to improve your game. You can review your game with comments, or study how Stockfish thinks, or track your progress. No in-app purchase, no ads, no data tracking. SmallFish is simply amazing. It's small but powerful, you'll be surprised. Features --------- - Blunder checking - Multiple line analysis - Graphical evaluation of your game - Game previews - Dark mode support - Endgame tablebase - Opening books Why not just download and try it yourself?

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: NotePad++ - Pro
entry.summary: Notepad Pro+ Advanced Tools: 9,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 5,99Â â‚¬
entry.content:
Discount Information

All Price Information

Priceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced Toolsï¼š5,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Todayâ€™s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization â€¢ Unlimited notes storage â€¢ Multiple note colors â€¢ Pinned & private notes â€¢ Custom font styles & font sizes â€¢ Sort notes by name or date â€¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time â€¢ Easy note sharing â€¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security â€¢ App lock with multiple passcode options â€¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync â€¢ iCloud sync for notes â€¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications â€¢ Widget for todayâ€™s notes â€¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager â€¢ Create and manage PDF files â€¢ Edit existing PDFs â€¢ Export notes as PDF â€¢ Share PDFs easily â€¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs â€¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. Weâ€™re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

Application Screenshot

iPad
